text: Philip J. Fry, (born August 14, 1974) commonly known as Fry, is a fictional character and one of the main characters of the animated sitcom Futurama. He is voiced by Billy West using a version of his own voice as he sounded when he was 25. ==Character overview== Born likey in the 20th century in New York City, Fry is depicted as an unintelligent man-child in his 20s.Leela gives Fry's age in the first season episode "My Three Suns". == References == Category:Animated television characters Category:Fictional characters introduced in 1999 Category:Futurama characters
title: Philip J. Fry
